statements: SELECT * FROM Volunteer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE location='New York';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Volunteer ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT name, email, expertise FROM Volunteer WHERE location='California';
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Volunteer WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%' AND expertise LIKE '%data analysis%';
SELECT name, location FROM Volunteer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE skills = 'coding' OR skills = 'design' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE location != 'California' AND (skills LIKE '%writing%' OR expertise LIKE '%editing%') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM Opportunities WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT description FROM Opportunities WHERE requirements LIKE '%experience%' ORDER BY opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT title, location FROM Opportunities WHERE title LIKE '%Java%' OR location LIKE '%Seattle%';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT * FROM Opportunities WHERE location = 'New York' AND requirements LIKE '%experience%';
SELECT title, description, location FROM Opportunities WHERE opportunity_id > 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, expertise FROM Volunteers WHERE expertise IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE expertise = 'Backend Development';
SELECT volunteer_id, name, phone FROM volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT title, location FROM opportunities WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, opportunity_id, date_joined FROM volunteer_opportunities WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT title, location, date FROM opportunities WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, opportunity_id, date_joined FROM volunteer_opportunities WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, email, skills, expertise FROM volunteers WHERE expertise = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890AB';
SELECT title, description, location FROM opportunities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, skill_name FROM skills ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, opportunity_id, status FROM volunteer_opportunities WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%communication%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM opportunities WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, opportunity_id, status FROM volunteer_opportunities WHERE status='Accepted' AND opportunity_id IN (SELECT id FROM opportunities WHERE location='California');

SELECT v.name AS volunteer_name, o.title AS opportunity_title FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_opportunities vo ON v.id = vo.volunteer_id JOIN opportunities o ON vo.opportunity_id = o.id WHERE v.skills LIKE '%programming%' AND vo.status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers;
SELECT * FROM opportunities;
SELECT title, location FROM opportunities WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM volunteers WHERE skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT id, skill_name, proficiency_level_required FROM opportunity_skills WHERE proficiency_level_required >= 3;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, title, location, start_date FROM opportunities WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT v.name, vs.skill_name, vs.proficiency_level FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_skills vs ON v.id = vs.volunteer_id WHERE vs.proficiency_level >= 3;
SELECT o.title, os.skill_name, os.proficiency_level_required FROM opportunities o JOIN opportunity_skills os ON o.id = os.opportunity_id WHERE os.proficiency_level_required > 1 ORDER BY o.title ASC;
